title: Asset Tracker v2 Messages
description: Describes the messages published by the device

btn.description: The number and the time a button was pushed

ts.description: Timestamp as Unix epoch with millisecond precision (UTC) when the button was released

impact.description: The magnitude and time of a motion impact event

v.description: Magnitude of the impact in g

ts.description: Timestamp as Unix epoch with millisecond precision (UTC) when the impact was detected
